[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@thi.ng/hdom-components](./hdom-components.md) &gt; [ButtonGroupOpts](./hdom-components.buttongroupopts.md)

## ButtonGroupOpts interface

Button group component config options.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ButtonGroupOpts 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [attribs](./hdom-components.buttongroupopts.attribs.md) | <code>IObjectOf&lt;any&gt;</code> | Attribs for button group container. |
|  [first](./hdom-components.buttongroupopts.first.md) | <code>Button</code> | Pre-configured stateless button component function for first button in group. MUST be provided. |
|  [inner](./hdom-components.buttongroupopts.inner.md) | <code>Button</code> | Pre-configured stateless button component function for inner buttons in group. Only used if at least 3 buttons in group. If not specified, <code>first</code> will be used. |
|  [last](./hdom-components.buttongroupopts.last.md) | <code>Button</code> | Pre-configured stateless button component function for last button in group. If not specified, <code>first</code> will be used. |
